question: What is the name of the mobile application launched by Jharkhand, to deliver essential commodities to people amid lock-down?
explanation:
The Chief Minister of Jharkhand Hemant Soren has launched a mobile application named Jharkhand Bazar, which aims to deliver essential commodities to the people of the state amidst the lock-down and control the spread of Covid-19 outbreak.
The application has been developed by the Department of Food, Public Distribution and Consumer Affairs of the state. The state had earlier launched ‘Jharkhand Sahayta App’ to assist migrant workers in receiving the financial assistance of Rs.1000 and Rs.2000. It has been used by more than 2 lakh workers, as per the state.
